lore: Chaos Spawn are roiling masses of mutating flesh and bone that lurch towards the foe with mindless ferocity. They wail and slobber from fanged maws as they lash wildly about themselves with barbed pseudopods, snapping claws and clubbing limbs, tearing and crushing all who do not flee in horror.

faction: Regenerating Monstrosities: At the start of each playerâ€™s Command phase
one model in this unit regains up to D3 lost wounds.
